mapper.select: /* 스토어 정보 조회, serviceUser_SQL.getStoreInfo */ SELECT OWNER_NAME , EMAIL , TEL , BUSINESS_NUMBER , STORE_NAME , STORE_NUMBER , URL , INSTAGRAM , PROC_COMM_KRNM(CITY) AS "cityNm" , PROC_COMM_KRNM(DISTRICT) AS "districtNm" , '(' || POST_CODE || ') ' || ADDR || ' ' || COALESCE(DETAIL_ADDR, '') || EXTRA_ADDR AS ADDR FROM SERVICE_STORE WHERE SEQ = #{storeSeq}::INTEGER

/* 스토어 첨부파일 조회, serviceUser_SQL.getStoreRefFile */ SELECT FILE_SEQ , TYPE , FILE_PATH , ORG_FILE_NAME , SAVE_FILE_NAME FROM STORE_REF_FILE SRF WHERE store_seq = #{storeSeq}::INTEGER ORDER BY FILE_SEQ ASC
